com.epimorphics.lda.specs
Class APISpec

java.lang.Object
  com.epimorphics.lda.specs.APISpec

public class APISpec
extends Object

Encapsulates a specification of a single API instance. API specification is transported via RDF but this object state is self contained to make it easier to migrate to GAE-JDO storage for persisting specs.

Version:
$Revision: $
Author:
Dave Reynolds

public Bindings getBindings()
Answer the bindings of variables for this API configuration. Never null, but may be empty.

public Factories getRendererFactoryTable()
Answer a copy of the renderer factory map. (It's a copy so that the caller can freely mutate it afterwards.)
